course_description: From tsarist days through the rise and fall of the Soviet Union, Russia has grappled with issues of imagination and identity. The course focuses on a battle of realities in 20th-century Russia, and it examines the powerful dynamics between art and politics. Films, slides, and music accompany texts.
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E103
